info.title: jukebox
info.description: Stream and organize all your audio content in one place.

get.summary: List all tracks for the current user

parameters.description: Required to be true for the API request to pass

parameters.description: Track ID

parameters.description: Required to be true for the API request to pass

404.description: Track file or record not found
